Mod3_Description: If an enemy is {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}, Slowed, or {c_important}{u}Chilled{/u}{/c} then {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} will {c_important}{u}Daze{/u}{/c} them for {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%x|]{/c} longer.
Mod2_Description: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing direct damage to enemies affected by {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} has up to a {c_number}{SF_7}%{/c} chance to reduce its Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} second, or by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds instead if the enemy is {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
Mod0_Description: Enemies affected by {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} take {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you.
desc:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
Throw a smoky concoction at enemies that {c_important}{u}Dazes{/u}{/c} them for {c_number}{buffduration:SMOKE_BLINDNESS}{/c} seconds.
name: Smoke Grenade
